sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import TweetCard from './TweetCard'; import './App.css'; // We'll create this file next function App() { const [tweets, setTweets] = useState([]); const [analytics, setAnalytics] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('dashboard'); useEffect(() => { // Fetch tweets and analysis fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/analyze') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setTweets(data); setLoading(false); // After getting tweets, fetch analytics return fetch('http://localhost:3001/api/analytics'); }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setAnalytics(data)) .catch(err => { console.error('Error fetching data:', err); setLoading(false); }); }, []); return (

AI Social Bot

{activeTab === 'dashboard' && (

Dashboard Analytics

{analytics ? (

Tweet Summary

{analytics.totalTweets} Total Tweets
{analytics.responseTime.toFixed(2)}s Avg Response Time

Sentiment Breakdown

üòä Positive
{analytics.positiveTweets}
üòê Neutral
{analytics.neutralTweets}
üò† Negative
{analytics.negativeTweets}

Recent Activity

{tweets.slice(0, 3).map((t, i) => (
{t.username} {t.tweet.substring(0, 40)}... 0 ? 'positive' : t.sentiment < 0 ? 'negative' : 'neutral'}`}>
))}
) : (
Loading analytics data...
)}
)} {activeTab === 'tweets' && (

Tweet Analysis

{loading ? (

Loading tweets and generating AI responses...

) : (
{tweets.map((t, i) => )}
)}
)} {activeTab === 'settings' && (

Bot Settings

AI Response Configuration

Short Medium Long
)}

AI Social Bot ¬© {new Date().getFullYear()} - Intelligent Twitter Engagement

); } export default App;
